title: banned beacause of riot
body: banned because riot couldn't get there sht together, I reported a bug with my in game loading screen, game wouldn't load at all so I reported it to riot, then what I did after was go on another account and try a bot game and see if it would work but clearly not. so clearly there is something wrong with my fcking server yet I still get banned and I just finished my 20 bans yesterday, I reported this stuff like 4 times but nothing still hasn't been done for me

replies.body: Could you give some more detail as to the issues you are having in loading screen? Very unlikely this is a bug, but rather a bad install or patch on your end. Do you run League as administrator?
I've reported this as well, but all I've been told is that "it happens".
